summary: This bill, the Expand Navigators’ Resources for Outreach, Learning, and Longevity Act of 2025 (ENROLL Act of 2025), aims to amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act. It focuses on the navigator program, modifying requirements for grant selection, expanding the scope of information navigators provide (including Medicaid and CHIP), and specifying public education activities. The bill also introduces a requirement for navigators to maintain a physical presence for in-person assistance and outlines funding mechanisms for both State and Federal Exchanges, allocating $100 million annually from user fees.
